sections.paragraph: 2. a place where there is leisure for anything, a school
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Probably feminine of a presumed derivative of the alternate of G2192; properly loitering (as a withholding of oneself from work) or leisure, that is, (by implication) a “school” (as vacation from physical employment): - school.
